attachments.title: Provide a way to tell if a command is executed from i_CTRL-O or not by ujihisa · Pull Request #3000 · vim/vim
attachments.text: Problem A user-defined command cannot tell if it&#39;s executed as an Ex command, or as i_CTRL-O from insert mode. This makes it hard to implement some Vim plugins, such as one that inserts text in...
